p: The data were analysed using SPSS 19.0 (Chicago, USA). The categorical variables are presented as frequencies and percentages, and quantitative data are reported as the median (interquartile range). Chi-square test or Fisher’s exact tests were used for categorical data, and the quantitative data were analysed using non-parametric rank sum test (Kruskal-Wallis test) [ 28, 29]. Two-sided P value < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
